description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Your world is at risk in this story-driven retro rhythmical platformer! Discover the rich universe of groovy music creatures, the Ollopas, in their battle against chaotic forces disrupting the harmony of their planet. In search of a long lost magical artifact, you impersonate the young Vegah in departure for Earth. Do you have what it takes to travel through time and bring back the powerful item?
